text: Kyō (kiyoki) yoimono ga anata gata ni yurusa reru. Keiten o sadzuke rareta min no tabemono wa, anata gata ni gōhōdeari, anata gata no tabemono wa, kare-ra ni mo gōhōdearu. Mata shinja no teisetsuna on'na, anata gata izen ni, keiten o sadzuke rareta min no naka no teisetsuna on'na mo. Moshi anata gataga (teisetsuna) on'na ni kan'in ya mittsū o sezu ni, kichinto konshi o atae tsuma ni mukaerunaraba yurusa reru. Oyoso shinkō o kyohi suru mono wa, sono zenkō mo munashiku, raise ni oite wa, shippai-sha no ruidearu
